ai.question: Which two statements are true regarding IP packets? (Choose two.)

choice.text: They have a header that contains a source and destination IP address.
They are addressed using a source and destination MAC address.

ai.question: Select the true statement regarding the ping and tracert commands.

choice.text: Tracert shows each hop, while ping shows a destination reply only.
Both ping and tracert can show results in a graphical display.
Ping shows whether the transmission is successful; tracert does not.

ai.question: Where do ISPs get the public addresses that they assign to end users?

choice.text: ISPs are assigned addresses through the RFC.
ISPs obtain address blocks from registry organizations.

ai.question: What are three characteristics of UTP cabling? (Choose three.)

choice.text: easiest type of networking cable to install
most commonly used type of networking cable
commonly used for Internet connectivity by a cable TV provider

form-item.ai: provides limited services to a few usersprovides transport services to a large number of userscontains many different devicescontains few devicesrequires robust equipmentpurchases Internet connectivity HomeInternet Service Provider Drag the characteristic on the left to the appropriate network environment on the right.123456no titleno description given1462351Home=provides limited services to few, few devices, purchases Internet connectivity Enterprise=provides transport services, robust equipment, contains many devices
